languages.text: {n}Вы чувствуете как где-то за гранью разума расцветает зловещая ухмылка. Знакомый голос вновь вторгается в ход мыслей:{/n} "Кровь воистину прольется, но воитель ошибается по поводу ее источника. Дай ему насладиться ложью, рожденной из неведенья. Позволь ему поверить, что Темный Апостол падет от вашей руки. Мой час близок — я явлюсь вновь в последний раз, когда придет время вложить глас Истины в твои уста".

{n}You feel a sinister grin blossom somewhere beyond your reason's edge. The familiar voice intrudes upon your train of thought again.{/n} "Blood will be spilt indeed, but the warrior is mistaken as to its source. Allow him to relish that lie born out of ignorance. Allow him to believe that the Dark Apostle will fall by his hand and yours. My hour is drawing near. I will appear again, one last time, when the moment comes to make your mouth speak with the voice of the Truth."
languages.original_text: {n}Вы чувствуете как где-то за гранью разума расцветает зловещая ухмылка. Знакомый голос вновь вторгается в ход мыслей:{/n} "Кровь воистину прольется, но воитель ошибается по поводу ее источника. Дай ему насладиться ложью, рожденной из неведенья. Позволь ему поверить, что Темный Апостол падет от вашей руки. Мой час близок — я явлюсь вновь в последний раз, когда придет время вложить глас Истины в твои уста".

languages.text: {n}你感觉到理性的边缘之外绽放出了邪恶的笑容，那个熟悉的声音再次打断了你的思绪。{/n}“今天确实会有人死在这里，但那些战士却没弄明白死的人是谁。让他尽情享受那充满无知的谎言吧，让他相信黑暗使徒会死在你们的手上吧。时机马上就要成熟了，我会再次出现，那会是最后一次。等那一刻到来的时候，我会让你的口中说出真理的话语。”
languages.original_text: {n}You feel a sinister grin blossom somewhere beyond your reason's edge. The familiar voice intrudes upon your train of thought again.{/n} "Blood will be spilt indeed, but the warrior is mistaken as to its source. Allow him to relish that lie born out of ignorance. Allow him to believe that the Dark Apostle will fall by his hand and yours. My hour is drawing near. I will appear again, one last time, when the moment comes to make your mouth speak with the voice of the Truth."

languages.text: {n}Du spürst, wie irgendwo hinter den Grenzen deiner Vernunft ein düsteres Grinsen erblüht. Die vertraute Stimme bricht wieder in deine Gedanken ein.{/n} "Blut wird vergossen werden, ja, doch der Krieger irrt sich, was die Quelle des Blutes angeht. Gestattet ihm, diese aus Ignoranz geborene Lüge auszukosten. Gestattet ihm, zu glauben, dass der Dunkle Apostel durch seine Hand und Eure fallen wird. Meine Stunde naht. Ich werde wieder erscheinen, noch ein letztes Mal, wenn der Augenblick kommt, Euren Mund mit der Stimme der Wahrheit sprechen zu lassen."
languages.original_text: {n}You feel a sinister grin blossom somewhere beyond your reason's edge. The familiar voice intrudes upon your train of thought again.{/n} "Blood will be spilt indeed, but the warrior is mistaken as to its source. Allow him to relish that lie born out of ignorance. Allow him to believe that the Dark Apostle will fall by his hand and yours. My hour is drawing near. I will appear again, one last time, when the moment comes to make your mouth speak with the voice of the Truth."

Ich werde wieder erscheinen, noch ein letztes Mal, wenn der Augenblick kommt, Euren Mund mit der Stimme der Wahrheit sprechen zu lassen."

languages.text: {n}Percibes que se forma una siniestra sonrisa en algún lugar más allá del límite de tu consciencia. Una voz familiar vuelve a interrumpir tus pensamientos.{/n} «Oh, ya lo creo que se derramará sangre, pero el guerrero equivoca su origen. Deja que disfrute de esa mentira nacida de la ignorancia. Deja que crea que el Apóstol Oscuro sucumbirá a sus manos y las tuyas. Mi hora está próxima. Resurgiré una vez más, cuando llegue el momento de hablar a través de tu boca con la voz de la Verdad».
languages.original_text: {n}You feel a sinister grin blossom somewhere beyond your reason's edge. The familiar voice intrudes upon your train of thought again.{/n} "Blood will be spilt indeed, but the warrior is mistaken as to its source. Allow him to relish that lie born out of ignorance. Allow him to believe that the Dark Apostle will fall by his hand and yours. My hour is drawing near. I will appear again, one last time, when the moment comes to make your mouth speak with the voice of the Truth."

Una voz familiar vuelve a interrumpir tus pensamientos.{/n} «Oh, ya lo creo que se derramará sangre, pero el guerrero equivoca su origen. Deja que disfrute de esa mentira nacida de la ignorancia. Deja que crea que el Apóstol Oscuro sucumbirá a sus manos y las tuyas. Mi hora está próxima. Resurgiré una vez más, cuando llegue el momento de hablar a través de tu boca con la voz de la Verdad».

languages.text: {n}Vous sentez un sourire sinistre apparaître au-delà des frontières de votre raison. La voix désormais familière s'immisce une fois encore dans vos pensées.{/n} « Oui, le sang coulera, mais le guerrier se trompe quant à sa source. Laissez-le savourer ce mensonge né de l'ignorance. Laissez-le croire que l'Apôtre Noir succombera face à vous deux. Mon heure approche. Je réapparaîtrai une dernière fois, quand le moment sera venu de faire parler la vérité à travers vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}You feel a sinister grin blossom somewhere beyond your reason's edge. The familiar voice intrudes upon your train of thought again.{/n} "Blood will be spilt indeed, but the warrior is mistaken as to its source. Allow him to relish that lie born out of ignorance. Allow him to believe that the Dark Apostle will fall by his hand and yours. My hour is drawing near. I will appear again, one last time, when the moment comes to make your mouth speak with the voice of the Truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous sentez un sourire sinistre apparaître au-delà des frontières de votre raison. La voix désormais familière s'immisce une fois encore dans vos pensées.{/n} « Oui, le sang coulera, mais le guerrier se trompe quant à sa source. Laissez-le savourer ce mensonge né de l'ignorance. Laissez-le croire que l'Apôtre Noir succombera face à vous deux. Mon heure approche. Je réapparaîtrai une dernière fois, quand le moment sera venu de faire parler la vérité à travers vous. »

languages.text: {n}理性の限界を超えたどこかで、邪悪な笑みが活気を帯びるのを感じた。聞き覚えのある声が再びあなたの思考の流れに侵入してくる。{/n}「確かに血は流れるだろうが、戦士はそれがどこから来ているかを誤解している。無知から生まれた嘘を彼に楽しませるといい。ダークアポスルは自分の手とお前の手によって落ちると彼に信じさせてくれ。時間がなくなってきている。俺は最後にもう一度現れるだろう、お前が真実の声を語るその時に」
languages.original_text: {n}You feel a sinister grin blossom somewhere beyond your reason's edge. The familiar voice intrudes upon your train of thought again.{/n} "Blood will be spilt indeed, but the warrior is mistaken as to its source. Allow him to relish that lie born out of ignorance. Allow him to believe that the Dark Apostle will fall by his hand and yours. My hour is drawing near. I will appear again, one last time, when the moment comes to make your mouth speak with the voice of the Truth."

languages.text: {n}Aklının sınırlarının ötesinde bir yerde netameli bir sırıtışın yayıldığını hissediyorsun. Tanıdık bir ses, yeniden düşünce akışına müdahale ediyor.{/n} "Kan döküleceği doğru ancak savaşçı, kanın sahibi konusunda yanılıyor. Bırak da cehaletten doğan bu yalanın tadını çıkarsın. İzin ver de Kara Apotr'ın sizin elinizde telef olacağını sanmaya devam etsin. Zamanım yaklaşıyor. Vakit geldiğinde ağzından Hakikat'in sesinin yükselmesini sağlamak için son bir kez daha ortaya çıkacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}You feel a sinister grin blossom somewhere beyond your reason's edge. The familiar voice intrudes upon your train of thought again.{/n} "Blood will be spilt indeed, but the warrior is mistaken as to its source. Allow him to relish that lie born out of ignorance. Allow him to believe that the Dark Apostle will fall by his hand and yours. My hour is drawing near. I will appear again, one last time, when the moment comes to make your mouth speak with the voice of the Truth."
